answers.answer: no its early yet for the heartbeat... actually is pretty early all together for the ultrasound, i would wait till next time to see whats going on before stressing too much just incase the date is off too...and dont worry about the diabetes, as long as its controlled and monitored you should be fine!Good luck! and take care
PS the heartbeat/fetal pole usually can be seen at 6-7 weeks

question: Hey guys. I need some advice. I had an abdominal ultrasound at 5 weeks and 2 days. They seen the gestational sac and a tiny yolk sac. Unfortunately, there was no fetal pole or heartbeat. This is my fourth pregnancy and all my others are fine. This is the first time I have had an ultrasound this early. In June, I was diagnosed with Type 1 Diabetes and really scared that I may lose the baby. Is it normal to not have a heartbeat then? Thanks in advance! :)
title: 5 weeks 2 days
